Introduction
This topic contains information on a potential surviving spouse’s DIC entitlement and a child(ren)’s DIC award, including
actions to take when
a potential surviving spouse fails to file a claim for DIC
, and
a surviving spouse claim is denied
adjusting the child(ren)’s award when a surviving spouse claim is denied
, and
actions to take when a surviving spouse establishes entitlement to DIC
.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section C - Awarding Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) to Children Based on the Determination of Surviving Spouse Entitlement
citation: Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section C
